welcome.subject: Welcome to LegacyGuard - Your Family Protection Journey Begins
welcome.headline: Welcome to Your Family Protection Plan
welcome.introduction: Thank you for entrusting LegacyGuard with your family's future security. We understand the importance of the step you've taken today.
welcome.step1: Complete your profile setup to personalize your experience
welcome.step2: Take our 5-minute assessment to create your custom protection plan
welcome.step3: Begin adding your most important assets and documents
welcome.step4: Designate trusted family members or friends to help in emergencies
welcome.supportMessage: Our support team is here to assist you every step of the way. Don't hesitate to reach out if you need any guidance.
welcome.securityNote: Your information is protected with bank-level encryption and will never be shared without your explicit permission.

verification.subject: Please Verify Your Email Address - LegacyGuard
verification.headline: Verify Your Email Address
verification.message: To ensure the security of your account and enable important family protection notifications, please verify your email address.
verification.instruction: Click the button below to verify your email address:
verification.alternativeLink: If the button doesn't work, copy and paste this link into your browser:
verification.linkExpiry: This verification link will expire in 24 hours for your security.
verification.alreadyVerified: If you've already verified your email, you can safely ignore this message.
verification.troubleshooting: If you're having trouble, please contact our support team for assistance.

passwordReset.subject: Reset Your LegacyGuard Password
passwordReset.headline: Password Reset Request
passwordReset.message: We received a request to reset the password for your LegacyGuard account. If you made this request, please click the button below to create a new password.
passwordReset.notRequested: If you did not request a password reset, please ignore this email. Your account remains secure.
passwordReset.linkExpiry: This password reset link will expire in 1 hour for your security.
passwordReset.securityTip: For your account security, we recommend using a strong, unique password that you don't use elsewhere.
passwordReset.contactSupport: If you continue to have trouble accessing your account, please contact our support team.

taskReminder.subject: Gentle Reminder: Complete Your Family Protection Tasks
taskReminder.headline: Your Family Protection Plan Needs Attention
taskReminder.message: We wanted to gently remind you about some important tasks that will strengthen your family's protection plan.
taskReminder.encouragement: Each completed task brings greater peace of mind for you and security for your family.
taskReminder.noRush: Take your time - there's no rush. Complete these tasks when it's convenient for you.

documentExpiry.subject: Important: Document Renewal Required
documentExpiry.headline: Document Renewal Reminder
documentExpiry.message: We noticed that one of your important documents is approaching its expiration date.
documentExpiry.action: Please review and update this document to ensure your family protection plan remains current.
documentExpiry.importance: Keeping your documents current ensures your family can access the most up-to-date information when they need it.

familyAccess.subject: Family Member Access Notification
familyAccess.headline: Family Access Update
familyAccess.memberAdded: {{memberName}} has been granted access to your family protection information.
familyAccess.securityNote: You can modify or revoke access at any time through your account settings.

willGenerated.subject: Your Will Has Been Generated - Important Next Steps
willGenerated.headline: Your Will Document is Ready
willGenerated.message: Your Last Will and Testament has been successfully generated based on the information you provided.
willGenerated.importantNote: IMPORTANT: This document is not legally binding until properly executed according to your jurisdiction's requirements.
willGenerated.step1: Review the document carefully for accuracy
willGenerated.step2: Print the required number of copies
willGenerated.step3: Sign in the presence of required witnesses
willGenerated.step4: Store the original in a secure location
willGenerated.legalDisclaimer: This document was generated using the information you provided. We strongly recommend having it reviewed by a qualified attorney in your jurisdiction.
willGenerated.storageRecommendation: Store your executed will in a secure location and inform your executor of its location.

legalReview.subject: Legal Review Available for Your Documents
legalReview.headline: Professional Legal Review
legalReview.message: Your estate planning documents are ready for professional legal review to ensure they meet all requirements in your jurisdiction.
legalReview.benefit3: Provides peace of mind for you and your family
legalReview.optional: Legal review is optional but highly recommended for comprehensive estate planning.

loginAlert.subject: New Login to Your LegacyGuard Account
loginAlert.headline: Account Access Notification
loginAlert.message: We're writing to inform you that your LegacyGuard account was accessed from a new device or location.
loginAlert.wasYou: If this was you, no action is needed.
loginAlert.action2: Review your account for any unauthorized changes
loginAlert.supportContact: If you have any concerns, please contact us immediately.

suspiciousActivity.subject: Security Alert: Unusual Account Activity Detected
suspiciousActivity.headline: Account Security Alert
suspiciousActivity.message: We detected unusual activity on your LegacyGuard account and have temporarily restricted access as a precautionary measure.
suspiciousActivity.actionTaken: We have temporarily secured your account to protect your family's information.
suspiciousActivity.step1: Verify your identity by clicking the button below
suspiciousActivity.automaticProtection: This automatic protection helps keep your sensitive family information secure.

trialExpiring.subject: Your LegacyGuard Trial Expires in {{days}} Days
trialExpiring.headline: Your Trial is Ending Soon
trialExpiring.message: Your free trial of LegacyGuard will expire in {{days}} days. We hope you've found value in protecting your family's future.
trialExpiring.consequence1: Your account will be limited to basic features
trialExpiring.consequence2: Some advanced protection tools will be unavailable
trialExpiring.consequence3: Your data will remain secure and accessible
trialExpiring.continueProtection: To continue protecting your family without interruption:
trialExpiring.noCommitment: You can cancel anytime, and your data will always remain yours.
trialExpiring.questions: Have questions about our plans? Our support team is happy to help you choose the right option.

paymentFailed.subject: Payment Issue - Action Required for Your LegacyGuard Account
paymentFailed.headline: Payment Processing Issue
paymentFailed.message: We encountered an issue processing your payment for LegacyGuard. Your family protection plan remains active, but we need to resolve this payment issue.
paymentFailed.action3: Contact your bank if the issue persists
paymentFailed.gracePeriod: Your account will remain active for {{days}} more days while we resolve this issue.
paymentFailed.supportHelp: If you need assistance, our support team is here to help.

subscriptionCancelled.subject: Your LegacyGuard Subscription Has Been Cancelled
subscriptionCancelled.headline: Subscription Cancellation Confirmed
subscriptionCancelled.message: We've processed your cancellation request. We're sorry to see you go, but we understand that circumstances change.
subscriptionCancelled.accessPeriod: You'll continue to have full access until: {{accessEndDate}}
subscriptionCancelled.dataRetention: Your family protection data will be securely retained for {{retentionDays}} days after cancellation.
subscriptionCancelled.reactivate: Changed your mind? You can reactivate your subscription anytime before {{date}}.
subscriptionCancelled.exportData: If you'd like to export your data, you can do so from your account settings.
subscriptionCancelled.feedback: We'd appreciate any feedback about your experience to help us improve our service.

invitationSent.subject: You've Been Invited to Join {{senderName}}'s Family Protection Plan
invitationSent.headline: Family Protection Plan Invitation
invitationSent.message: {{senderName}} has invited you to be part of their family protection plan on LegacyGuard.
invitationSent.responsibility: This means you may be called upon to help {{senderName}}'s family during important times.
invitationSent.access1: You'll have access to important information when needed
invitationSent.access2: You can help ensure {{senderName}}'s wishes are carried out
invitationSent.access3: You're trusted to support their family during difficult times
invitationSent.questions: If you have questions about this responsibility, please contact {{senderName}} directly.
invitationSent.honor: Being chosen for this role is a significant honor and responsibility.

accessGranted.subject: Access Granted to {{ownerName}}'s Family Protection Information
accessGranted.headline: Family Access Confirmation
accessGranted.message: {{ownerName}} has granted you access to their family protection information on LegacyGuard.
accessGranted.guidelines: Please review the access guidelines to understand when and how to use this information.
accessGranted.trust: This access is granted based on {{ownerName}}'s trust in you to help protect their family.

maintenanceNotice.subject: Scheduled Maintenance - LegacyGuard Service Update
maintenanceNotice.headline: Scheduled System Maintenance
maintenanceNotice.message: We will be performing scheduled maintenance to improve our service and security.
maintenanceNotice.impact2: No data will be lost or affected
maintenanceNotice.preparation: No action is required on your part. Your family protection plan will remain secure throughout the maintenance.
maintenanceNotice.apology: We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your patience as we work to improve our service.
maintenanceNotice.updates: For real-time updates, visit our status page: {{statusUrl}}

dataExportReady.expiry: This download link will expire in 7 days for security reasons.
dataExportReady.format: Data format: Secure ZIP file with JSON and PDF documents
